name: Knight's Duty
description:
We tried to make an fun tower defence game with the concept of farming and finally crafting a lot of cool stuff, which in the end fell a bit short, but we hope u still enjoy :)

Controls:

Ctrl - Open Menu

Arrow keys - Move

Space - Interact

DevNotes:

This is our first Unity Project as a team of 2, and because of that we planned way to many gameplay features, which lead to running out of time. The game is playable but there are still thouthands of bugs and prototype art, and the amount sf crafting items is also very minimal. The game has no menus and a lot of player feedback is missing. Because of that we consider this more an early prototype to get the jist of the game concept rather than a finished game.
